# The ModernAlternative Investing Experience
Aqua empowers financial advisors to invest beyond conventional asset classes and access opportunities traditionally only available to large institutions and ultra-high net worth investors.

## Aqua Product Offerings
Our products are designed to facilitate frictionless investment into private markets opportunities.
Wealth Advisors
### Access Funds
An end-to-end platform that manages all aspects of operational work required to facilitate an investment into a private fund or private company, eliminating any lift from the advisor.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b103055efb4e57a952_web.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b19721e79cc6ab6d90_SPV-as-a-Service.svg)
Wealth Advisors & Fund Managers
### Aqua Connect
Connecting advisors to a curated selection of top quartile private equity, private credit, real estate and venture capital funds from our GP partners.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b103055efb4e57a952_web.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b182485676959d8546_Marketplace.svg)
Fund Managers
### Feeder Funds
A no-lift-to-GP solution that serves as a high-net-worth aggregator, unlocking a new class of potential LPs for funds without the additional operational workload.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b103055efb4e57a952_web.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b14eaafc1230ae77d2_Feeder%20Funds.svg)
## Alternative Assets
An alternative investment is a financial asset that doesn’t fall into conventional asset categories, like stocks, bonds and cash. Alternative assets include private equity, venture capital, hedge funds, real estate and collectibles. 
1
Modernize Any Portfolio
Your clients are likely underexposed to alternative investments such as Private Equity. Professional investors allocate ~50% of their assets to alternatives yet the average individual only has ~5% exposure.
Individual Investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633c040da9fcd902b7c30ad1_Graphic.svg)
Professional Investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/634a8d8ee8327e7f7b1edb48_Group%2048466.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/634a8db86f6b028d5292b93a_Group%2048468.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633c040d5b4b6d31aa611169_Group%2048467.svg)
2
Strong Risk Adjusted Returns
Alternative investments provide the risk-adjusted return most portfolios are missing. Take a look at Private Equity funds - they consistently outperform the public markets, with the top performing private equity funds vastly outperforming public equities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633c02ef59026f027aced570_Graphic.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633d7cbd2c5398645c04f6bd_graph-tablet.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633ea08a172e7201f9cd7e7a_graph-mobile.svg)
3
Diversification 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633f09a53fa50d5cf183b9d6_United%20States.svg)
Six stocks now account for 30% of the S&P 500’s returns. Investing exclusively in public markets creates a lot of concentration in your portfolio. Given the vast majority of US companies are privately held, alternative investments allow investors to hedge their risk against market downturns by reducing correlation and truly diversifying their portfolio.
## Curated Opportunities
We carefully curate a selection of top performing alternative investments funds from world-class managers. Our investment team extensively diligences every fund we work with, assessing on the basis of track record, strategy, team and marketability to Aqua investor base. Only a small subset of the funds we diligence make it through our investment committee and are offered to our investors.
[Contact Us](https://www.investwithaqua.com/<#>)

## Aqua For Advisors
We combine white-glove service with high-tech automation to provide a frictionless experience for your team and your clients to access a wide range of alternative investments. Our lowered minimums enable you to diversify any client portfolio into a traditionally inaccessible asset class.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63b927fd4084180a5afeea81_adv-icon-1.svg)
### Experience
Aqua's digital platform was built to deliver an unmatched client experience. In addition to our technology, working with Aqua provides access to our team of like-minded individuals from world-class organizations across the financial services landscape including private equity, capital markets, custody, and financial technology.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63b9277fd45a7a197c97523c_adv-icon-2.svg)
### Customization
RIAs are given a versatile experience allowing for a wide variety of integrations including white-labeling or co-branding. Aqua also enables curation of investments for your clients from an inventory of exclusive top-quartile funds and will assist in gaining access to specific funds at request.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63b9277f3d3d7a4d26458c3a_adv-icon-3.svg)
### Comprehensive
We support you and your clients from subscription through the lifecycle of an alternative investment. This includes detailed fund due diligence, simplified and condensed reporting on investment performance and and a fee structure that mirrors how advisors commonly bill their clients.
## Investing Made Simple
Our end-to-end digital experience materially simplifies investing in alternatives at industry low minimums and fees.

## Aqua for Fund Managers
We create feeder funds that reduce the headache of aggregating smaller ticket sizes from strategic pools of capital such as wealth management channels, friends & family and strategic operating partners.
### Aqua's digital solution simplifies every aspect of the alternative investment lifecycle.
Know Your Customer(KYC)
Anti-Money Laundering(AML)
SPV Creation
Sub Doc Creation& Signing

Capital Calls& Distributions
Performance Reporting

Wealth Manager/ RIA Integrations
## Leadership Team
### A combination of private equity and technology backgrounds
When Rohan worked at Blackstone, he noticed that alternative asset managers were always in high demand, but were only accessible by large institutions or ultra high-net-worth individuals.
Rohan wanted to drastically expand access to these investment opportunities, so he teamed up with an ambitious technologist, Dev. Together, they are proudly revolutionizing access to alternative assets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63bbbebee3ca2af4a6f56fda_Rohan%20\(1\).png)
#### Rohan Marwaha
Co-founder & CEO
Previously worked at Blackstone. Vanderbilt Commodore. NY Red Bulls fan and semi-mediocre golfer.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633d5a0b5714e7d499088e16_entypo-social_linkedin-with-circle.svg)](https://www.investwithaqua.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/rohanmarwahanj/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63bbbebdcfc084725c8056bf_Dev%20\(1\).png)
#### Dev Patel
Co-founder & CTO
Previously worked at Bank of America. Vanderbilt Commodore. Patriots fan and mediocre golfer.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633d5a0b5714e7d499088e16_entypo-social_linkedin-with-circle.svg)](https://www.investwithaqua.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/devpatel9/>)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633d5a0b5714e7d499088e16_entypo-social_linkedin-with-circle.svg)](https://www.investwithaqua.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/donald-h-027840146/>)

## Disclaimer
Aqua does not make investment recommendations and no communication, through this website or otherwise should be construed as a recommendation of any security. Alternative investments in private placements are highly illiquid, speculative, and involve a high degree of risk. Past performance is not indicative of future results. Investors may not get back their money originally invested and those who cannot afford to lose their entire investment should not invest. Prior to investing, carefully consider the respective fund documentation for details about potential risks, charges, and expenses. The value of an investment may go down as well as up. An investment in a private equity ("PE") fund or investment vehicle is not the same as a deposit with a banking institution. Investors receive illiquid and/or restricted membership interests that may be subject to holding period requirements and/or liquidity concerns. Investors who cannot hold an investment for the long term (at least 10 years) should not invest. In the most sensible investment strategy for PE investing, PE should only be part of your overall investment portfolio. The PE portion of your portfolio may include a balanced portfolio of different PE funds.
1 Source: UBS/Campden Wealth Global Family Office Report, Morgan Stanley Investment Management – Public to Private Equity in the United States
2 Source: Preqin
3 Source: BlackRock: Reimagining the 60/40 portfolio

## Aqua Product Offerings
Our products are designed to facilitate frictionless investment into private markets opportunities.
Wealth Advisors
### Access Funds
An end-to-end platform that manages all aspects of operational work required to facilitate an investment into a private fund or private company, eliminating any lift from the advisor.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b103055efb4e57a952_web.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b19721e79cc6ab6d90_SPV-as-a-Service.svg)

### Aqua Connect
Connecting advisors to a curated selection of top quartile private equity, private credit, real estate and venture capital funds from our GP partners.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b103055efb4e57a952_web.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b182485676959d8546_Marketplace.svg)
Fund Managers
### Feeder Funds
A no-lift-to-GP solution that serves as a high-net-worth aggregator, unlocking a new class of potential LPs for funds without the additional operational workload.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b103055efb4e57a952_web.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/643aa9b14eaafc1230ae77d2_Feeder%20Funds.svg)
## Alternative Assets
An alternative investment is a financial asset that doesn’t fall into conventional asset categories, like stocks, bonds and cash. Alternative assets include private equity, venture capital, hedge funds, real estate and collectibles. 
1
Modernize Any Portfolio
Your clients are likely underexposed to alternative investments such as Private Equity. Professional investors allocate ~50% of their assets to alternatives yet the average individual only has ~5% exposure.
Individual Investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633c040da9fcd902b7c30ad1_Graphic.svg)
Professional Investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/634a8d8ee8327e7f7b1edb48_Group%2048466.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/634a8db86f6b028d5292b93a_Group%2048468.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633c040d5b4b6d31aa611169_Group%2048467.svg)
2
Strong Risk Adjusted Returns
Alternative investments provide the risk-adjusted return most portfolios are missing. Take a look at Private Equity funds - they consistently outperform the public markets, with the top performing private equity funds vastly outperforming public equities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633c02ef59026f027aced570_Graphic.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633d7cbd2c5398645c04f6bd_graph-tablet.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633ea08a172e7201f9cd7e7a_graph-mobile.svg)
3
Diversification 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633f09a53fa50d5cf183b9d6_United%20States.svg)
Six stocks now account for 30% of the S&P 500’s returns. Investing exclusively in public markets creates a lot of concentration in your portfolio. Given the vast majority of US companies are privately held, alternative investments allow investors to hedge their risk against market downturns by reducing correlation and truly diversifying their portfolio.
## Curated Opportunities
We carefully curate a selection of top performing alternative investments funds from world-class managers. Our investment team extensively diligences every fund we work with, assessing on the basis of track record, strategy, team and marketability to Aqua investor base. Only a small subset of the funds we diligence make it through our investment committee and are offered to our investors.

## Aqua For Advisors
We combine white-glove service with high-tech automation to provide a frictionless experience for your team and your clients to access a wide range of alternative investments. Our lowered minimums enable you to diversify any client portfolio into a traditionally inaccessible asset class.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63b927fd4084180a5afeea81_adv-icon-1.svg)
### Experience
Aqua's digital platform was built to deliver an unmatched client experience. In addition to our technology, working with Aqua provides access to our team of like-minded individuals from world-class organizations across the financial services landscape including private equity, capital markets, custody, and financial technology.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63b9277fd45a7a197c97523c_adv-icon-2.svg)
### Customization
RIAs are given a versatile experience allowing for a wide variety of integrations including white-labeling or co-branding. Aqua also enables curation of investments for your clients from an inventory of exclusive top-quartile funds and will assist in gaining access to specific funds at request.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63b9277f3d3d7a4d26458c3a_adv-icon-3.svg)
### Comprehensive
We support you and your clients from subscription through the lifecycle of an alternative investment. This includes detailed fund due diligence, simplified and condensed reporting on investment performance and and a fee structure that mirrors how advisors commonly bill their clients.
## Investing Made Simple
Our end-to-end digital experience materially simplifies investing in alternatives at industry low minimums and fees.
1
Choose Opportunity
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633d4e6dbab039620e010c59_graph1%20-%20export%20svg..svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/633ea4db5cff568e0a932298_mobile%201.svg)

## Aqua for Fund Managers
We create feeder funds that reduce the headache of aggregating smaller ticket sizes from strategic pools of capital such as wealth management channels, friends & family and strategic operating partners.
### Aqua's digital solution simplifies every aspect of the alternative investment lifecycle.

## Leadership Team
### A combination of private equity and technology backgrounds
When Rohan worked at Blackstone, he noticed that alternative asset managers were always in high demand, but were only accessible by large institutions or ultra high-net-worth individuals.
Rohan wanted to drastically expand access to these investment opportunities, so he teamed up with an ambitious technologist, Dev. Together, they are proudly revolutionizing access to alternative assets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63bbbebee3ca2af4a6f56fda_Rohan%20\(1\).png)
#### Rohan Marwaha
Co-founder & CEO
Previously worked at Blackstone. Vanderbilt Commodore. NY Red Bulls fan and semi-mediocre golfer.

Co-founder & CTO
Previously worked at Bank of America. Vanderbilt Commodore. Patriots fan and mediocre golfer.
![⟨9⟩](https://www.investwithaqua.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/devpatel9/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63bbbebd7fceb0f9ef65b8f7_Teddy%20\(1\).png)
#### Teddy Freedman
Head of Investment Strategy & Business Operations
Previously worked at Siris Capital and Guggenheim Partners. FC Barcelona & Manchester City fan, great golfer.
![⟨9⟩](https://www.investwithaqua.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/teddyfreedman/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61113c243149734061f229ab/63bbbebdc6b9efef1ea606f7_Donald%20\(1\).png)
#### Donald Hession
Founding Engineer
Ex-backend engineering lead for Betterfin (YC S17, acquired by Cross River Bank). Enjoys chess, boxing and meditation.

## Disclaimer
Aqua does not make investment recommendations and no communication, through this website or otherwise should be construed as a recommendation of any security. Alternative investments in private placements are highly illiquid, speculative, and involve a high degree of risk. Past performance is not indicative of future results. Investors may not get back their money originally invested and those who cannot afford to lose their entire investment should not invest. Prior to investing, carefully consider the respective fund documentation for details about potential risks, charges, and expenses. The value of an investment may go down as well as up. An investment in a private equity ("PE") fund or investment vehicle is not the same as a deposit with a banking institution. Investors receive illiquid and/or restricted membership interests that may be subject to holding period requirements and/or liquidity concerns. Investors who cannot hold an investment for the long term (at least 10 years) should not invest. In the most sensible investment strategy for PE investing, PE should only be part of your overall investment portfolio. The PE portion of your portfolio may include a balanced portfolio of different PE funds.
1 Source: UBS/Campden Wealth Global Family Office Report, Morgan Stanley Investment Management – Public to Private Equity in the United States
2 Source: Preqin
3 Source: BlackRock: Reimagining the 60/40 portfolio

generated_description:
**Aqua: The Modern Alternative Investing Experience**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from the bustling financial hub of New York, Aqua is an innovative fintech startup that aims to streamline how financial advisors access alternative assets for their clients. It initially emerged from Y Combinator’s S21 batch, and its mission is straightforward: to empower financial advisors to seamlessly invest in alternative asset classes—something typically reserved for large institutions and ultra-high-net-worth individuals.

### What Aqua Does

Aqua is an end-to-end platform tailored for financial advisors, designed to facilitate investments in curated alternative assets without the cumbersome operational overhead. This platform connects advisors to a handpicked selection of top-tier private equity, venture capital, and real estate funds, effectively democratizing access to wealth-building opportunities that have historically been out of reach.

**Investment Opportunities**: Alternative investments can include private equity, hedge funds, venture capital, and real estate, all of which Aqua provides personalized access to. Their approach not only increases exposure to higher-performing investments but also allows for better portfolio diversification.

### The Team

With a compact team of six employees, Aqua is spearheaded by co-founders Rohan Marwaha and Dev Patel, both of whom bring rich backgrounds in the finance and technology sectors. Rohan's past experience at Blackstone enlightened him to the demand for alternative asset access, while Dev complements this vision with robust technological expertise garnered from Bank of America.

### Product Offerings

**1. Access Funds**: Aqua handles all operational details, simplifying the investment process for financial advisors.
   
**2. Aqua Connect**: This feature enables wealth managers to access a curated selection of top-performing funds, further enhancing their ability to provide bespoke investment options for clients.
   
**3. Feeder Funds**: Designed for fund managers, this service aggregates smaller investments, ideal for unlocking a wider investor base without adding administrative burdens.

### Market Position and Validation

Aqua has already managed to secure a total investment amounting to $2.45 million, showcasing strong engagement and confidence from its customers. The company is backed by notable investors, emphasizing its credibility and potential in the alternative investment space.

### The Bigger Picture

In today's investing landscape, diversification is not just smart; it's essential. While professional investors typically allocate about 50% of their assets into alternatives, everyday investors often find themselves limited to a mere 5%. Aqua aims to bridge this gap, ensuring that a wider audience can partake in the substantial returns that alternative investments can provide.

### Closing Thoughts

Aqua stands at the intersection of technology and finance, poised to change the way advisors and their clients approach investments. With a strong backing, a deliberate service model, and an accessible platform, they are set to redefine what it means to invest in alternatives. For financial advisors keen on modernizing their investment strategies, Aqua might just be the partner they’ve been looking for.

To learn more about what Aqua offers and how they can help you or your clients, visit [Aqua's website](https://www.investwithaqua.com).
